channel.title: moosebegab tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from moosebegab.

item.description: @sandyshores27 they do dogs and cats. she needs a good brush out and bath. she very old and really doesn't groom herself anymore.
item.source:markdown: @sandyshores27 they do dogs and cats. she needs a good brush out and bath. she very old and really doesn't groom herself anymore.

item.description: it's already been a morning. nerves shot taking cat to groomer. ugh.
item.source:markdown: it's already been a morning. nerves shot taking cat to groomer. ugh.

item.description: sometimes I'll feel weak from hunger, eat a meal bu then still feel weak. im not diabetic or pre-D. sugar numbers ok.

item.description:
And on the flip side, their method helps suggest the cure. #scriptingnews https://t.co/whTSFe4HAF

"People need repeated exposure to solid news and conversation. They need people they can trust to talk to. They need time in a non-threatening situation to process things. They need neighbors and members of community groups who share some passion or some commitment."
item.source:markdown:
And on the flip side, their method helps suggest the cure. #scriptingnews https://t.co/whTSFe4HAF
"People need repeated exposure to solid news and conversation. They need people they can trust to talk to. They need time in a non-threatening situation to process things. They need neighbors and members of community groups who share some passion or some commitment."

item.description:
had a dream with 2 dancing egg boxes. light blue with giant smiling egg on each. one male, one female. apparently represented my recently passed MIL and FIL. made me cry in my dream.

for the life of me, cant figure out why eggs? lol
item.source:markdown:
had a dream with 2 dancing egg boxes. light blue with giant smiling egg on each. one male, one female. apparently represented my recently passed MIL and FIL. made me cry in my dream.
for the life of me, cant figure out why eggs? lol

item.description: hubby doesnt feel good. might be vertigo. head is really swimming today.

item.description:
If there are limits, you are saying the preborn take precedence over mother.

Creating limits hinders doctors during maternal emergencies even if mother is not terminating.

You're creating an extra layer of bureaucracy between doctor and patient.

#BodyAutonomy #MedicalPrivacy https://t.co/AF6VbNwS2p
item.source:markdown:
If there are limits, you are saying the preborn take precedence over mother.
Creating limits hinders doctors during maternal emergencies even if mother is not terminating.
You're creating an extra layer of bureaucracy between doctor and patient.
#BodyAutonomy #MedicalPrivacy https://t.co/AF6VbNwS2p

item.description: So my goblin read a post about ME/CFS and realized how much she could relate. I've brought it up before because I would read about it and think that sounds familiar. #chronicillness

item.description: my liver numbers are good (usually slight elevated) but now my kidney numbers are a bit off. Creatinine is 1.07. e-GFR is 58. my body doesnt know how it wants to end me. #medical
